article_title: 'Celebration of life' held for aid workers killed in Gaza
sentence: A  "celebration  of  life"  service  has  been  held  in  memory  of  three  British  aid  workers  killed  in  Gaza  earlier  this  month.

article_title: 'Celebration of life' held for aid workers killed in Gaza
sentence: The  memorial  event,  held  at  the  National  Cathedral  in  Washington  DC,  America,  honoured  seven  men  killed  in  the  Israeli  strike  on  1  April,  including  James  Kirby,  from  Bristol,  John  Chapman  from  Poole  and  James  Henderson  from  Cornwall.

article_title: 'Celebration of life' held for aid workers killed in Gaza
sentence: Mr  Kirby  was  one  of  seven  World  Central  Kitchen  (WCK)  workers  who  died  while  travelling  with  a  convoy  leaving  a  warehouse  in  Deir  al-Balah,  south  of  Gaza  City.
